recordTypes.name: Food Service Establishment License Application
recordTypes.description: For annual licensure of food service establishments

recordTypes.name: Septic System Repair / Replacement Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Application for permit to construct a new septic system or repair an existing septic system. Do not check off multiple types of permits. New construction is for new homes only. Please use repair for existing homes that need a new system.

recordTypes.name: Water Treatment Wastewater Disposal System
recordTypes.description: Permit to install a Water Treatment Wastewater Disposal System (water from a water softener, etc)

recordTypes.name: Application for Septic Plan Review-Engineer & Installer
recordTypes.description: Health Department review & approval of Engineer and CT licensed septic installer designed septic systems

recordTypes.name: Application for septic soil test
recordTypes.description: Percolation and Test Pits for septic system design

recordTypes.name: Food Vending License (Food / Ice Cream Truck)
recordTypes.description: Mobile Food Vending (Requires approval by First Selectman's Office)

recordTypes.name: Application for  Soil Erosion and Sediment Control Permit
Building Permit Project Application (Commercial)
recordTypes.description:
This application is designated for commercial projects ONLY.

ALL subcontractors need to be on the permit or their individual permits must be issued PRIOR to any Inspections being performed.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit Project Application (Residential)
recordTypes.description:
This Permit is for Residential Single Family Homes, two Family Homes or Townhouses as defined by the CT State Building code. Renovations, Additions, Alterations etc. 
ALL subcontractors need to be on the permit or their individual permits must be issued PRIOR to any Inspections being performed.

recordTypes.name: Deck ONLY Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This Permit is for decks ONLY, Attached or Detached from a building.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This permit is for the demolition of any building being removed from a property. Commercial or Residential.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Electrical work not on a building permit. THIS APPLICATION IS NOT FOR SOLAR!!

recordTypes.name: Event Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Regulate all outdoor events i.e. carnivals and fairs as it pertains to emergency vehicles; access to fire protection equipment; placement of stands, tents, concession booths, and exhibits; and the control of hazardous conditions to life and property, such as crowd controls, evacuation plans, risk & threat assessments, alcohol management etc. cooking, food safety, electrical, gas etc.

recordTypes.name: Generator Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Used when installing a manual or automatic generator set.

recordTypes.name: LP Gas Tank / Lines Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Used When Installing LP Gas or LP gas Lines

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit Application (HVAC, Heat, Ventilation, Air Conditioning)
recordTypes.description: This permit is for HVAC and associated work. duct work, oil burner, furnace etc.

recordTypes.name: Miscellaneous Work Permit Application
recordTypes.description:
Tents, Hot tubs, Windows. Wood, Gas Inserts, replacements etc. OIL TANK REMOVAL / Install.
ELECTRICAL, PLUMBING, HEATING, HVAC, GENERATORS, DEMOLITION AND SOLAR ARE TO BE ON THEIR OWN INDIVIDUAL PERMIT APPLICATIONS!

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit Application
recordTypes.description: For any Plumbing Work not associated with a project

recordTypes.name: Roof Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Used when re-roofing or roof repair. PLEASE BE AWARE OF 2015 IRC 905.1.1 REQUIRES SEALING OF ROOF SHEATHING JOINTS!!

recordTypes.name: Siding Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Used when installing or replacing siding

recordTypes.name: Solar Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Solar installation. Used whether or not you have a Commercial or Residential Building Permit

recordTypes.name: Swimming Pool Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This application is for the installation of a swimming pool. A swimming pool is defined as any pool 2' in height or more. blow up, metal does not matter.

categories.name: BUILDING DEPARTMENT
categories.content:
!!!! IMPORTANT !!!!

The next state building, fire safety and fire prevention codes will go into effect on October 1st, 2022.

categories.content: The Town of New Fairfield’s Fire Marshal's Office warrants safety through education of the residents and businesses in town regarding fire safety and life safety code.  The staff of the Marshal&r
